uwx F-Droid

This is a repository of apps to be used with F-Droid. Applications in this repository are official binaries built by the original application developers.

Currently it serves 30 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/uwx/auto-daily-fdroid/fdroid-repo/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
78 13 15 BF 3D BC A3 A6 5D 6D F1 28 16 A4 F9 5F EF B2 A3 2E 21 4D D3 AE FF 3A D8 A2 7C 5A D9 15
